website_summaries.verdict: A practical and inexpensive awning that provides extra shade and sun protection at a good price.
pros: Frame and installation hardware included in the cost
A large size at 8 feet by 2 feet
Also comes in a 4 feet by 2 feet option for most standard window openings
Gives a new look to the outside of your house quickly at a low cost
cons: Pay attention to size when ordering
This model is 8 feet by 2 feet, and best for a door or larger window space

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great. Easy to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed this awning. Was easy to assemble after following instructions carefully. Took two persons. Installing it to exterior wall took 2 hours. Package came with long anchor screws and rope. It is manually retractable without a crank. But we like it down. We mounted ours low on purpose. It shades our door entryway very well. And it is also water repellent. We like it a lot. Just that if you look underside of the awning fabric, you can see the loose fabric threads. We hope this awning will last at least a few years. Looks great over our door and now the door feels cooler not get cooked by the summer hot sun!
customer_reviews.author: feline_graduate_studentTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. Two men installed one in about 30 minutes, so they installed quickly and easily. I ordered three eight-foot awnings for the west side of my house, and even the neighbors have commented how pretty they are. I also got lucky that they match my green house perfectly. Also, the fabric is thin/light enough to allow light to come into the house without having direct sunlight hit the drapes and furniture. I'm very pleased with these awnings.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Canvas awnings are great
customer_reviews.text: It can be very sunny and intense sun at 9,200 feet, so these awnings are super. Gives us more privacy and keep the rooms cooler. We used rope & eye hook to fasten corner to wall so doesn't flop in wind. We can only use 4 months, but so far we love them. One picture shows you the corner piece that holds 2 together. We used super fine sandpaper to clean the inside to knock off the burrs so would screw in better. 1st unit took 4.5 hours; all of the others took 2 hours. We are happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hooge

customer_reviews.title: Adorable awnings
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest install, but definitely worth the pain. My house was so plain in the front and these awnings give so much life while blocking the intense sunshine inside. My friends and family are raving over them. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Z.

customer_reviews.title: Desert proof
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are great. We have them installed on a couple of windows in the Palm Springs area and they really cut down on both the glare and heat, but still let some light in. Lost a star because we had to improvise a cable tie down to keep them from folding up in the daily 50mph winds - but the winds haven't damaged them in the six months they have been up.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Has a great look, easy to install and added bucks to the value of my house. Great price. The headline says 8 inches x 2 inches, but of course it was 2 x 8 feet. A perfect size to cover an outside door that was exposed to the weather. Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pretty functional awning
customer_reviews.text: Great awning, somewhat easy to follow for directions.... However, they can't count. Missing 2 connectors and 2 head snaps
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall value is great. Assembly is reasonably easy. Delivery and Packaging are fine. The canvas sizing, quality, and sewing could be somewhat better. It looks alright though.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 3 OF THESE. GREAT FOR THE MONEY. A LOCAL COMPANY WAS GOING TO CHARGE ME $500 EACH. GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... in process of installing them but the quality looks great. Am sure they will work fine
customer_reviews.text: we are still in process of installing them but the quality looks great. Am sure they will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Remington

customer_reviews.title: Buy screws! Do not use the crappy ones in the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Would of been 5 stars but they put the cheapest, crappiest screws in the pack. Blount ends and strips so easily. I went and got American made screws and the awning is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up would buy again for next window
customer_reviews.author: elvis carmel maddox

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Had to study the instructions for a bit first but overall it was fairly easy to put up....took a couple of hours. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Whitson

customer_reviews.title: Great service and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love my awnings! Have attached them to a shed my husband built and attached some birdhouses and feeders and it looks amazing, Here are pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Santora

customer_reviews.title: quality and to know well the dimension
customer_reviews.text: hello every one, i do have windows 48" W x 60" H this frame will fit good on my windows?
customer_reviews.author: GUILLERMO

product_meta.title: ALEKO WAW8X2MSTRGR58 Window Canopy Awning 8 x 2 Feet Multi-Stripe Green
product_meta.description: Air conditioning during the summer can get expensive, not to mention a waste of energy. Instead of paying more for inefficient air conditioning, try ALEKO Canopy Awnings! ALEKO’s awnings fit most standard doors and windows and will shade them from sun and rain, which will help regulate your home’s temperature no matter the season. Our awnings are also an attractive addition to any home, and will accent your windows and doors beautifully. ALEKO Canopy Awnings are a snap to install and usually take less than an hour to have fully set up. If you’re looking to give your windows and doors a new look, and to keep cool and dry at the same time, try ALEKO and you might never reach for your A/C again! Awning Dimensions: 8 x 2 feet; Color: Multi-Stripe Green.
feature_bullets: ALEKO’s canopy awnings protect windows and doors from sun and rain, keeping your home cooler and safe from UV rays
Fits most windows and doors, including sliding doors
Easy to install: usually takes less than an hour with no complex tools needed; just what’s inside a standard toolbox
Includes frame, fabric cover, and installation hardware
Awning Dimensions: 8 x 2 feet; Color: Multi-Stripe Green

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
